message: Bob, I'm thrilled to offer you this incredible product! It's a rare opportunity, and I believe it will be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $950000 for it, reflecting its exceptional quality and potential.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $900000.  This still reflects the significant value of the product to you, and it gives us both a good deal. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $900000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $820000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.

Bob, I understand your perspective.  I'm willing to go down to $875000. This is a significant concession on my part, but it also reflects the value of the product to you.  Let's reach an agreement that benefits us both.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $875000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $790000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.
